ðŸ“– Summary: Swaptop is a real-time swap usage monitor for Linux and Windows systems with a TUI interface. It lists processes using swap, displays consumption per-process/per-software, and provides live-updating graphs, allowing users to quickly identify and address swap-related performance issues.
